content: **this is the shine on knitted hat pattern there is a **free** version on my blog here 1 and a ready to print paid pdf version here on raverly** the shine on knitted hat by martin up north martinupnorth com materials & measurements stitch marker tapestry needle needle size a circular needles 40cm in given size needle size b circular needles 40 cm or double point needles scheepjes merino soft 50% superwash merino wool x 25% microfibre x 25% acrylic 50grams = 105meters or scheepjes metropolis 75% extra fine merino wool x 25% nylon 50grams = 200meters - alternative a small child size circumference not stretched 40 cm needle size a 3 50mm needle size b 4 00mm yarn 1 ball of scheepjes merino soft 618/wood 50 grams used 1 ball of scheepjes merino soft 641/van gogh 21 grams used - alternative b child size small adult size circumference not stretched 42cm needle size a 4 00mm needle size b 4 50mm yarn 2 ball of scheepjes merino soft 606/da vinci 53 grams used 1 ball of scheepjes merino soft 631/mallais 18 grams used 1 https //martinupnorth com/2020/12/16/the-shine-on-knitted-hat-free-knitting-pattern-inside/
